nvidia.description: An Nvidia RTX 5090 video card. A decent video card for gaming.

actions.examine: An ASUS RTX 5090 Video Card! Released in 2024 to great acclaim and an even greater price, this video card will will be a great card to play Minesweeper on!

take.response: You remove the NVidia RTX 5090 Video Card from the PC case, look around to make sure no one is watching, and then furtively put it in your bag.

monstermash.description: The 1962 Monster Mash song by Bobby Pickett - a twisted horror song.

actions.examine: A scary, vampire themed horror song that kids play repeatedly when they want to REALLY annoy their parents. 'I was working in the lab, late one night... We did the Monster Mash!'

take.response: You put the Monster Mash CD in your treat bag.

catmug.description: A black mug in the shape of a cat's head. Scary!

actions.examine: A heavy ceramic mug shaped like a cat's head. Black. Scary. This thing could do some real damage in the wrong hands!

take.response: You put the heavy cat mug in your treat bag.

doublemintgum.description: An unopened pack of Wrigley's Doublemint Gum.

actions.examine: An old pack of Wrigley's Doublemint Chewing Gum. 'Double your pleasure, double your fun, with Doublemint, Doublemint chewing gum!' (but just don't think about eating it - did I mention it looks very old?)

take.response: You pick up the pack of Doublemint Gum and put it in your bag.

actions.examine: Fantastic! A very expensive Lange & Sohne watch! It calculates the seasons! It even tells the time!

take.response: You put the watch on your wrist

strangerthings.description: A DVD of the 2016 Netflix series Stranger Things, starring Millie Bobby Brown and more.

actions.examine:
An old style clamshell case DVD of the 2016 Netflix series Stranger Things. Not scratched at all!

(LEGAL DISCLAIMER:'Stranger Things' is a trademark of Netflix Inc. and is brought to you by paid subscription only by Netflix. Click HERE to subscribe. Season 5, Volume 1 COMING SOON on November 26, 2025! Hold onto your walkie-talkies and mark your calendar!)

take.response: You put the DVD in your treat bag.

dog.description: Small ceramic figurine of a King Charles Cavalier dog. Not weird at all!

actions.examine: Ceramic figure of a King Charles Cavalier Spaniel. Will be great for throwing at a ghost or something.

take.response: You pick up the oddly shaped ceramic dog and put it in your bag.

actions.examine: Two Indian Head United States pennies, c1909. Decent condition. I wonder why they were in the safe?  Only worth $100 or so?  Sentimental value I guess.

take.response: You carefully put the two pennies in your pocket.

pumpkin.description: A small decorative pumpkin to celebrate the season!

actions.examine: A finely made glass pumpkin. Clearly hand-blown by a highly skilled artisan. Feels good in the hand. Will make a nice paperweight.

take.response: You carefully pick up the pumpkin and put it in your bag.

gamingmouse.description: Top of the line gaming mouse from Razer.

actions.examine: Great gaming mouse from Razer. Laser. High DPI. Low-latency. Wired or wireless. RGB. and more!

take.response: You put the Razer mouse in your bag.

frankenstein.description: Hardback copy of Mary Shelley's 1818 Frankenstein novel.

actions.examine: The book is a First Edition of the classic 'Frankenstein' novel by Mary Shelley. It looks like it might fall apart if not handled gently. You notice an old bookmark in the pages. Nice bookmark! You take it and put it in your pocket.

take.response: You put the book in your bag to read later.
